text: I know, sometimes you don't even have to ask twitter to do its thing
author: SamEifling

text: every pro-Electoral College take comes from a self-parody account
author: SamEifling

text: If you want to feel even better about it, just watch our whole episode on student loans. If you want a free or cheap education, you can always look abroad! I got my master's in Canada for a tiny fraction of what it would've cost here
author: SamEifling

text: Yeah, the online schools and for-profit schools offer almost nothing in the way of financial aid, so they leave their grads with truckloads of debt. Check out the 2014 totals from that same report:
author: SamEifling

text: Moon Landing Day (July 20). Whitney Houston's birthday (August 9). Prince's birthday (June 7). Mother's Day Part Deux (second Monday in May). Thanksgiving Week (final week in November). March Madness (Feb. 28 to April 8)
author: SamEifling

text: Sigh. I think no one has actually realized yet that we are in fact the same person
author: SamEifling

text: pretty sure the most soothing thing on the internet is the @washingtonpost 404 page
author: SamEifling

text: and of all the occasions to make this stand ... you chose the nicest day of 2019
author: SamEifling
